review: I found the infrastructure at the best. Excellent experience doctors team lead by Dr Vipin and Dr Pallavi. I was attended by Dr Sonali under supervision of Senior Doctors. She had done the job with great concentration, very softly and causing minimal pain. The support staff is also very humble and cooperative.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Crowns,
review:
******** ** * **** ************* ******** *** **** **** *** he has prepared excellent team of junior doctors to assist him and also other supporting staff  that understands and fulfills patients requirements with ease and thorough explanations in easy day to day languages. His clinic is also equipped with very good and latest dental equipments. 
I thank Dr. Vipin and his entire team for all works done on my teeth to my satisfaction in my budgeted time and money. 
Thank you all.
God bless you all. Keep doing good professional work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Single Sitting,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental X-Ray,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: Dr Vipin is a magician .he makes u feel so comfortable and puts u at ease .he is extremely experienced .he performs the surgery with so much ease u Dnt even realise slightest pain during the treatment .I hv gt my implants and wisdom tooth extraction and I was so scared but thx to see Vipin he made it feel and look so easy I didn’t even feel any pain and the treatment went so smoothly .the clinic is well equipped with modern latest technology.his entire staff is really sweet caring humble and well trained .they hv so much positive vibes within them and in the clinic .very helpful staff and doctors .I can’t mention everyone’s name .but really thankful to each one of them .ther are a wonderful team together .thx to the assistant doctors too .they are really sweet so we’ll trained and good at ther wrk .last I doubt forget to thank dr Pallavi .she is extremely caring sweet and an excellent doctor .really happy with my first experience at synergy clinic .thank u so much for fixing my several dental issues I had .the clinic follows all the necessary safety measures .would surely recommend to my friends and family

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Vipin Mahurkar has been treating me for close to 15 years now. His practice has grown along with his vast experience and skills. Very friendly *** ************** He has a wonderful team of doctors and associates who are always keen to help. Dr. Dhwani treated me for Root Canal and was extremely patient and hardworking, considering my dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,

Professional, courteous &friendly staff.Would highly recommend for dental treatments.

review: Dr. Vipin Mahurkar is well experienced the field of dental implants.  He provided me with the proper guidance which helped me to make a quick decision.  His team of doctors and support staff are efficient.  He is a pleasant personality and it shows in his interactions with his patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was indeed a good experience at Synergy , borivali west.Doctors were very friendly.They detected two deep cavities which was the root cause of my pain, helped and guided me with the right treatment. They would let me know all available treatment options, its benefits, risks and costs.The Staffs were really good and helpful in following up and scheduling/rescheduling appointment as per our convenience. They also helped me with requested mediclaim documents.Overall a very positive experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The attending Doctor was Dr. Sonali Sasane. I was little bit scared as she was not known to me and I had no earlier experience of her. But she managed well to get my treatment done. I am really satisfied with her work. I wish her every success in her future life. Thanks to Dr. Vipin also for his advises.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

tags: Treatment satisfaction,

👍

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Synergy dental clinic staff is very decent, helpful and  efficient . Clinic ambient is excellent.Its  neat and clean.U dont have to wait for long if u reach at appointment time.
  Dr Vipin Mahurkar,Dr Pallavi,Dr Sonali are the most experienced doctors.They work together as a team.When u go for implant or root canal or extraction of tooth or any other dental procedure, doctors do their job with precision and skill. You feel little or no pain during above procedures
Supportive staff is also well trained and doctors train them further during dental procedures.
Cost wise consulting charges r most reasonable.Their equipments and accessories are new and latest.Each machine table is cleaned before patient is called for checkup.
I  recommend synergy dental clinic for dental care.
reply_text: Thank you sir for your kind words. Your positive feedback keep us motivated to do the great jobs.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very good and dedicated services by team of doctors. Time management is good -- no waiting in ques. All related facilities are available at clinic.Most modern technology adopted at a reasonable cost. Patients are given proper medical advice and kept in good cheer. Or else pulling out a tooth or implants is "horror scene" in minds of most patients but with good skill tools and technology it is around comfort zone. Very detailed and comprehensive diagnosis is something not every dentist does -- is what has given Synergy a niche in dental practice. Care & Confidence displayed by young doctors in attending a patient like me (age 82 +) was very assuring. God bless!

tags: Doctor friendliness,

for any dental problem especielly for implant heisthe best.
